item.title: New Tools to Summarize Text
item.description: We’re excited to introduce the latest report and prototype from our machine intelligence R&D group! In this iteration, we explore summarization, or neural network techniques for making unstructured text data computable. Making language computable has been a goal of computer science research for decades. Historically, it has been a challenge to merely collect and store data. But it’s now so cheap to store data that we often have the opposite problem: once we’ve data, how should we analyze it to find meaning and insights?
